name: 1.1 - Check that current revision drawings are being used
Acceptance Criteria: Issued For Construction (IFC) and latest available revision used
Reference Documents: IFC Project Drawings/ Drawing Register
Record of conformity: Latest revision IFC drawings, ITP signed
1.2 - Implementation of all measures and controls
Frequency: Prior to commencing any activity
Acceptance Criteria: All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is: PSP, EMP, TMP, SWMS & WP
Reference Documents: OHSMP, EMP, TMS,  SWMS, WP
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed
Frequency: Prior to works commencing, 1 per delivery
Acceptance Criteria: Precast item resources and bedding specified or as shown on the Drawings.
Record of conformity: Receival inspection checklist
Frequency: Prior to works commencing, 1 per delivery

Acceptance Criteria: Pit covers shall be either cast iron, precast concrete covers or gratings as per drawings and shall be constructed and fixed to pits in accordance with relevant Tasmanian Standard Drawings
Reference Documents: EW-CE-DRW-526-001 - Pit Schedule C.5.16
Record of conformity: Receival inspection checklist
Acceptance Criteria: Concrete shall be at minimum 28-day strength, F’c of 32 MPa and when placed shall be well rammed to ensure thorough consolidation.
Acceptance Criteria: Foundation and/or bedding as per drawings and specifications
Record of conformity: This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria: Precast element level and position confirm with the the deisgn drawings and specifications
Record of conformity: This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria: Pit lids / surrounds shall be constructed to the detail shown on the drawings
Record of conformity: Concrete pour record and delivery docket
Record of conformity: Completion of prepour inspection checklist
Acceptance Criteria: Precast concrete cover or cast iron concrete infill as specified
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed
Acceptance Criteria: The horizontal deviation of any piped or box culverted drain shall not exceed 25mm from the true alignment.  There shall be no obvious sharp changes of direction.
• The maximum deviation from grade shall not exceed + or - 10mm for grades flatter than 1 in 500 and + or - 20mm for grades steeper than 1 in 500.
• The grade of any piped, box culverted, or open drain shall not exceed + or - 5% for grades flatter than 1 in 500 and + or - 10% for grades steeper than 1 in 500.
• Invert levels at structures shall not exceed + or - 10mm from the design invert.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed
Acceptance Criteria: Backfilling to match pavement design and to occur min. 72 hours post concrete pour.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the FH’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
